attributes.action: Why should MP's official cars be a luxury vehicle?
attributes.additional_details:
Why should MP's lease luxury vehicles at considerable expense to Tax Payers, when alternative vehicles are available from Ford, VW, Vauxhall etc at greatly reduced prices?

These vehicles can also be purchased (not leased) to enable afterwards the vehicles can be sold and obtain substantial funds back into the Treasury?

These vehicles can be altered in the same way as luxury cars.

(I do not mean electric vehicles,until these prices for these cars are majorly reduced!)
